item.description:
Join us for the third annual Exeter Photo Walk, part of the Annual Scott Kelby Worldwide Photowalk Tour.

We will hit several river locations, downtown locations off the beaten track, and portions of Phillips Exeter Academy. We'll end up at Me & Ollies across from the bandstand for lunch and photo sharing.

It will be early October, so the weather is unpredictable, but likely to be an excellent walking day. Bring bottled water, light snacks, and a rain or wind shell just in case.

This is important : this meetup page is for information purposes only. To be a part of the walk, please sign up on the Photowalk Tour website here. If you don't sign up on the Photowalk site, you won't get further details, won't be apprised of last-minute changes, and will be made to model in awkward poses wearing nothing but an Exeter Photowalk tutu sewn especially for the occasion. You've been warned.

If you have any trouble with the Photowalk Tour website (you'll recall that every year their website and support service have been a disaster), please let me know ASAP so I can start bothering them early.

I look forward to seeing everyone from last year, as well as any newcomers. The group will be limited to 50, so sign up while there's room.

Cheers,

John
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the gallery, you can't miss us. Parking in the rear.
item.name: Scott Kelby's PhotoWalk Tour - Exeter 2013
